text: James Johnston Blanchard (born August 8, 1942) is an American politician. He is a Democrat. He was a member of the United States House of Representatives from 1975 through 1983, as the 45th Governor of Michigan from 1983 through 1991, and as United States Ambassador to Canada from 1993 through 1995. ==Other websites== * The Governor James J. Blanchard Living Library Of Michigan Political History * Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Michigan Category:United States representatives from Michigan Category:Ambassadors of the United States to Canada Category:Politicians from Detroit Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: James Blanchard
